mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and assets for faster loading and a smoother mobile experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and use lazy loading to improve initial page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure all images have alt text and include more internal links to related content.
userExperienceTip: Add more interactive elements, like quick access to amenities and location information.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of required fields, if possible.
tips: Ensure faster mobile responsiveness for users on slower networks.
Improve SEO by adding more unique content on key pages like amenities and services.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website promotes and allows for bookings at the Residence Inn by Marriott in Marina del Rey.
